dim.name: nDustErosionDim
dim.description: The number of erosion layers in the GOCART dust emission parameterization

dim.name: nCAMLevels
dim.description: The number of atmospheric levels in the first-guess CAM-Chem data set

nml_option.name: config_chems_prefix
nml_option.description: Filename prefix of the first guess CAM-Chem data set

nml_option.name: config_chems_levels
nml_option.description: The number of atmospheric levels in the first guess CAM-Chem data set

nml_option.name: config_chems_cams
nml_option.description: Whether to read the CAMS surface emissions file

nml_option.name: config_chems_interp
nml_option.description: Whether to interpolate first-guess chemical species and emissions from input data

nml_option.name: config_chems_static
nml_option.description: Whether to interpolate erod,clayfrac,and sandfrac WPS static data (case 7 only)

var.name: erod_gocart
var.description: fraction of erodible surface for use in GOCART chemistry

var.name: clayfrac_gocart
var.description: fraction of clay soil for use in GOCART chemistry

var.name: sandfrac_gocart
var.description: fraction of sand soil fraction for use in GOCART chemistry

var.name: bc1_em_anthro
var.description: BC1 - Black carbon hydrophobic anthropogenic surface emission - sector All

var.name: co_em_anthro
var.description: CO - Carbon monoxide anthropogenic surface emission - sector All

var.name: oc1_em_anthro
var.description: OC1 - Organic carbon hydrophobic anthropogenic surface emission - sector All

var.name: nh3_em_anthro
var.description: NH3 - Ammonia anthropogenic surface emission - sector All

var.name: so2_em_anthro
var.description: SO2 - Sulfur dioxide anthropogenic surface emission - sector All

var.name: qbc1_fg
var.description: BC1 - First guess black carbon hydrophobic mixing ratio

var.name: qbc2_fg
var.description: BC2 - First guess black carbon hydrophilic mixing ratio

var.name: qoc1_fg
var.description: OC1 - First guess organic carbon hydrophobic mixing ratio

var.name: qoc2_fg
var.description: OC2 - First guess organic carbon hydrophilic mixing ratio

var.name: qseas1_fg
var.description: SEAS1 - First guess sea-salt size bin 1 mixing ratio (0.3um eff. radius)

var.name: qseas2_fg
var.description: SEAS2 - First guess sea-salt size bin 2 mixing ratio (1.0um eff. radius)

var.name: qseas3_fg
var.description: SEAS3 - First guess sea-salt size bin 3 mixing ratio (3.2um eff. radius)

var.name: qseas4_fg
var.description: SEAS4 - First guess sea-salt size bin 4 mixing ratio (7.5um eff. radius)

var.name: qdust1_fg
var.description: DUST1 - First guess dust size bin 1 mixing ratio (0.5um eff. radius)

var.name: qdust2_fg
var.description: DUST2 - First guess dust size bin 2 mixing ratio (1.4um eff. radius)

var.name: qdust3_fg
var.description: DUST3 - First guess dust size bin 3 mixing ratio (2.4um eff. radius)

var.name: qdust4_fg
var.description: DUST4 - First guess dust size bin 4 mixing ratio (4.5um eff. radius)

var.name: qdust5_fg
var.description: DUST5 - First guess dust size bin 5 mixing ratio (8.0um eff. radius)

var.name: qco_fg
var.description: CO - First guess carbon monoxide mixing ratio

var.name: qnh3_fg
var.description: NH3 - First guess ammonia mixing ratio

var.name: qso2_fg
var.description: SO2 - First guess sulfur dioxide mixing ratio

var.description: SO4 - First guess sulfate mixing ratio (accumulation mode)

var.name: qso4a2_fg
var.description: SO4 - First guess sulfate mixing ratio (aitken mode)

var.name: qso4a3_fg
var.description: SO4 - First guess sulfate mixing ratio (coarse mode)

var.name: pcam_fg
var.description: First guess pressure levels
